attributes.action: stop mass immigration that is having an unsustainable effect on hospitals, schools our benefit system and the housing stock and water supplies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is creating a situation where the indigenous population are feeling uncomfortable on the streets and worried about the long term effects when the people who are already in this country start having their large families at the expense of the long term tax payer from whom this government have usurped pensions and care.

rejection.details: Thank you but there are already several petitions open that request similar action for example http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UKImmigration/ If you still wish to open this petition, please re-submit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
